# Grazing Submodel

```{r}

source("grazingsubmodel.R")

# these will be present in Trevor's markdown
herb_n_new = 10
tree_n_new = 100
initial_n = c(herb_n_new, tree_n_new)
years = seq(from=1, to=100, by=1)


#should use sapply or another apply function? or ode()?
grazingresults = sapply(years, grazingsubmodel, initial_n)

# Store in data frame
Ptime = data.frame(G=grazingresults, years=years)

# Plot results
ggplot(grazingresults, aes(years,G))+geom_point()+labs(x="years",y="Grazing Results")


```
